#Text=Make Paper Shred Art
#Text=Paper shredders are a common home office item .
#Text=Shredders provide protection against identity theft , but they can also be used to make beautiful crafts and art projects !
#Text=Put your shredder on double duty using this guide on how to make paper shredder art .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Selecting a Paper Shredder
#Text=Pick a shredder type .
#Text=The type of shredder that you have will determine the type of project that you can do .
#Text=Go for strip cut shredders for versatility .
#Text=Strip cut shredders cut paper into strips .
#Text=The width of the strips depends on the machine , but it is typically between 1/4 and 1/2 inches .
#Text=Strip cut shredders are great for making collage art , but they are not as good for making confetti art .
#Text=Most shredder art guides use strip cut machines .
#Text=Use a cross cut shredder only for projects requiring very small pieces .
#Text=Cross cut shredders cut paper into small square pieces varying in size between XX and XX inches .
#Text=Higher security machines make even smaller shreddings and can even turn paper into dust — such machines are not good for making shredder art .
#Text=Cross cut shredders are more common than strip cut shredders , but they are not as versatile for creating art .
#Text=Consider other factors as you compare shredder models .
#Text=The size and capabilities of your shredder will impact the scale of your project .
#Text=Waste bin capacity , speed , run time , and multiple page capacity are all factors to consider .
#Text=The size of your shredder will help to determine the size of your project .
#Text=Waste bin capacity refers to the size , in volume , of the bin that a shredder discards shredder material into .
#Text=A shredder with a smaller waste bin capacity might slow you down .
#Text=Speed and run time can also slow you down .
#Text=A slow shredder will take longer to shred through your material .
#Text=Run time is the amount of time that a shredder can run continuously .
#Text=Do not overload your shredder by running it for longer than intended .
#Text=Some shredders can only shred one page at a time , while others can shred multiple or even many pages at once .
#Text=Never overload your shredder with more papers at one time than it can handle or it will jam or even break .
#Text=Selecting Paper
#Text=Create a color scheme .
#Text=Decide on a color or create a color scheme for your project .
#Text=If your project has a theme , such as Christmas or Halloween , you may already know what colors to use .
#Text=If you do not have a preset color theme , consider color theory when selecting colors .
#Text=You can also choose patterned paper , such as origami paper , to give your project an extra flair .
#Text=Choose the right weight paper .
#Text=Not all shredders can handle a heavier weight paper like card-stock , and not all art projects require heavily weighted paper either .
#Text=Consider the parameters for your project as well as the limitations of your machine when selecting paper .
#Text=Ensure an even mix of color in your project .
#Text=When adding your paper to the machine , do not add each color all at once .
#Text=Instead , add a few pieces of one color , then a few pieces of the next color , and so on in a cycle to ensure an even mix of colors in your shredder bag .
#Text=Alternatively , if you would like to keep the colors separate , consider using a different shredder bag for each color so that they do not mix at all .
#Text=Making Art
#Text=Make decorative jars .
#Text=Using any type of shredder , shred an even mix of colors in your color theme , and fill a jar with your shreddings .
#Text=These jars can be used as centerpieces at a wedding or party , conversation pieces on a shelf , or any other way that you would like !
#Text=Make collage art .
#Text=Using a strip shredder , shred an even mix of colors in your color theme , and make a collage .
#Text=You can cut the strips to different lengths with scissors to further customize your art .
#Text=Some ideas for collage are making a Christmas tree or a firework .
#Text=Get creative !
#Text=There are many different kinds of art projects that you can make with shreddings from your shredder : confetti , mosaics , weaving strips , and more !
#Text=There are endless possibilities .
#Text=Finally , your shreddings can be useful craft materials as well .
#Text=Extra shreddings can be used to package a gift , or to add zest to a gift bag .
#Text=Do n’t be afraid to experiment with this fun artform .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Remember to oil your machine .
#Text=A well-oiled shredder results in fewer jams .
#Text=Keep sensitive shredded material separate from your art material .
#Text=You do n’t want to accidentally use a sensitive document in your art !
#Text=Use shredder bags to keep your shreddings in order .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Keep your fingers away from the blades !
#Text=Even if the shredder is unplugged and off , you can still get cut .
#Text=Do not overload your shredder .
#Text=Things You 'll Need
#Text=Paper Shredder
#Text=Colored Paper
